Script Awake.description: Called after the object is loaded.

Script OnEnable.description: Called when object becomes enabled and active.

Script OnDisable.description: Called when object becomes disabled and inactive.

Script OnDestroy.description: Called before the object will be destroyed.

Script Start.description: Called when a script is enabled just before any of the Update methods is called for the first time.

Script Update.description: Called every frame if object is enabled.

Script LateUpdate.description: Called every frame (after Update) if object is enabled.

Script FixedUpdate.description: Called every fixed framerate frame if object is enabled.

Script OnDebugDraw.description: Called during drawing debug shapes in editor. Use DebugDraw.

Script OnDebugDrawSelected.description: Called during drawing debug shapes in editor when the object is selected. Use DebugDraw.

Script OnCollisionEnter.description: Called during fixed update when this collider/rigidbody started touching another rigidbody/collider. See also a Collision structure.

Script OnCollisionStay.description: Called every fixed update when this collider/rigidbody keeps touching another rigidbody/collider. See also a Collision structure.

Script OnCollisionExit.description: Called during fixed update when this collider/rigidbody ended touching another rigidbody/collider. See also a Collision structure.

Script OnTriggerEnter.description: Called during fixed update when the Collider enters the trigger.

Script OnTriggerStay.description: Called every fixed update when the Collider keeps touching the trigger.

Script OnTriggerExit.description: Called during fixed update when the Collider leaves the trigger.

Script OnJointBreak.description: Called when joint, that script is attached to, gets broken.
